Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.power

Class Power

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.power.Power
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicPower, ExtendedPowerDecorator
public abstract class Power
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Power class that will'll be decorated whit decorator pattern
Author:
Michele Lucio, Luca Morandini
